duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide onsite IT technical support for end-user desktops, laptops, and office IT, including network and server support.
Install and configure software on end-user systems and servers, and support new user onboarding.
Support offboarding activities, including collecting and managing IT assets, and providing executive/VIP support.
Manage IP phone and video conference support, as well as level 1 multifunction printers support.
Configure, deploy, and troubleshoot enterprise and personal desktop and laptop computers, midrange servers, and network devices.
Handle tickets on ServiceNow or similar ticketing system, troubleshoot VPN, and provide application support with Microsoft Office and SharePoint.
Troubleshoot MS Windows 10 and MS Office 365 issues for end-users, and manage office IT asset and stock management.
Coordinate external vendors when engaged for support, work independently, and coordinate in-house IT projects.
Provide technical guidance, prioritize workload, and lead the project support team, including asset/stock management, e-waste management, onsite training, and vendor co-ordination.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Information Technology or related field
